docs.snippet: The streaming giant Netflix doesn’t see theaters as essential, but in France even TV channels have a vested interest in theatrical releases. It’s uniquely French.

docs.snippet: The Polish poet’s message against ideology and nationalism seemed passé. Not any more.

docs.snippet: Critics credit shows like “The Handmaid’s Tale” and comedians like Stephen Colbert for dealing with issues that resonate today. Viewers, it seems, want shows that are “woke.”

docs.snippet: Sacramento police have placed the unidentified white officer on leave after releasing videos that show him repeatedly striking a black man.

docs.snippet: The wine industry makes junk wine because it sells like junk food. Good wines can be cheap or expensive, but they need not be processed.

docs.snippet: Several recent homicides in Suffolk County have been blamed on a transnational gang known as MS-13.
